title: Skin Re roll
body: I got 3 skin shards and i re roll them for one permanent skin. But i got a skin for a champion that i dont have, shouldnt i get a skin for one champion that i have?

replies.body: While it may not feel good when it happens, skin rerolls are designed to give you random skin permanents. Just like opening hextech chests, the items you get aren't guaranteed to be for champions you own already but are random.
